channel.title: Tools on 社畜人生
channel.description: Recent content in Tools on 社畜人生

item.title: HTML ascii 速查
item.description: #ascii-search { width: 100%; font-size: 1.6em; color: #5e7579; font-weight: bold; background-color: #eee7d4; border: none; outline: none; padding: 0.1rem 0.5rem; } .result { display: flex; flex-direction: column; align-items: center; justify-content: center; } .card { margin-top: 1rem; width: 100%; text-align: center; display: flex; border-radius: 5px; background-color: #6d6d6d91; color: #fff; } .card .content { display: flex; flex-direction: column; justify-content: space-around; align-items: flex-start; } .card .content span { } char ascii unicode desc let asciiData = null; const resultTemplate = ` {CHAR} {ASCII} {UNICODE} {DESC} `; let search = document.
